definition: secondary/auxiliary/deputy/assistant/vice-/abbr. for 副詞|副词 adverb/classifier for pairs, sets of things & facial expressions
to harness/to draw (a cart etc)/to drive/to pilot/to sail/to ride/your good self/prefixed word denoting respect (polite 敬辞)
to gallop/speedily/to proceed to/to pilot (ship, plane etc)/to sail

sentences.english: She got into the passenger seat and ordered me to go.
sentences.chinese: 她坐进副驾驶座位，命令我开车。

sentences.english: He went to talk with the woman, asking her to move out of the first-class section.
sentences.chinese: 副驾驶过去对她说，请她搬出一等舱。

sentences.english: The difference between a Captain and a First Officer is that the captain will have been with the company longer.
sentences.chinese: 机长和副驾驶的区别就在于，机长在该公司呆得更久。

sentences.english: Would they really lean across the passenger seat to toss out a bottle of piss?
sentences.chinese: 他们真的会将身体探过副驾驶位扔出一瓶尿吗？

sentences.english: He had purposefully sat as far to the left on the passenger seat as possible.
sentences.chinese: 他特意坐在了副驾驶位尽量靠左边的地方。

sentences.english: Not wanting to argue with a customer the flight attendant asked the co-pilot to speak to her.
sentences.chinese: 空姐不想和一位旅客争论，要求副驾驶去说服她。

sentences.english: Surprised, the flight attendant and the co-pilot asked the captain what he had said to her.
sentences.chinese: 空姐和副驾驶都感到吃惊，问机长对她说了些什么。

sentences.english: He put a soft carpet under your car-seat , since you like bare feet.
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢赤脚，他在副驾驶的位置脚下铺一小块羊绒毯。

sentences.english: She said her imaginary "copilot" guided her to safety.
sentences.chinese: 她说，她的想象中的“副驾驶”引导她到安全。

sentences.english: He took the controls last Sunday with co-pilot Kevin Rumens.
sentences.chinese: 上周日他与副驾驶员凯文驾驶火神进行8分钟的表演。

sentences.english: And, child safety sit chair should not be kept in front of the co-pilot position.
sentences.chinese: 并且，儿童安全坐椅不应放在前排副驾驶位置。

sentences.english: He sat for his examinations as a co-pilot.
sentences.chinese: 他参加了飞机副驾驶员的考试。

sentences.english: The feisty yet reliable droid served as Rendar's co-pilot and backup.
sentences.chinese: 这个活跃而可靠的机器人是伦德的副驾驶和后援。

sentences.english: The driver and copilot were injured heavier.
sentences.chinese: 驾驶员与副驾驶位人员受伤程度较重。

sentences.english: Surprised, the flight attendant and the co-pilot asked the captain what he said to her.
sentences.chinese: 空姐和副驾驶都感到吃惊，问机长对她说了些什么。

definition: empress's throne/(fig.) first place in a feminine competition
car door/door of bus, railway carriage etc
car window/window of vehicle (bus, train etc)
